headers.subject: [Jersey] Q: Regarding Jersey Client

body.para: I am using JERSEY-XXX-1.1.5.jars to build restful application as Jersey-XXX-1.3.jars are not compatible jre 6.1 , java SE 5 and webspehere6.1 servers . Could you please tell me from where I get Jersey-client-1.1.5.jar . I have other Jersey-XXX-1.1.5 jars and also having Jersey -XXX-1.3 jars but I am looking for this (Jersey-client-1.1.5.jar) specific one.

Also is there a way I can create client using Jersey-Client-1.3.jars but I have application builded using Jersey-XXX-1.1.5 . When I am running the test program its giving me unsupported version exception . The java class could not be loaded. java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: (com/sun/jersey/api/client/config/ClientConfig) bad major version at offset=6
